name: Sovereign Malachai: Formidable Deity of Beholden Rectangles: Intangible War on Dictionopolis
name_original: Sovereign Malachai: Formidable Deity of Beholden Rectangles: Intangible War on Dictionopolis
description:
The Malachai series is revived 5 long years after the release of Lord God King Malachai of the Rectangles and the Eternal Battle for Triangle Emancipation 2 2. In this prequel, join Malachai in his ascent to lord hood as he takes on regular polygons of sides upwards of SIX!

Fight armies of shapes by spelling words in the English language that are at least three letters long! If you need to start over, just click the letters you want back.

Large words with uncommon letters make the strongest attacks. But don't neglect to spell words with highlighted POWER tokens!

Take a break while playing and visit Tone Town, a neutral zone where all shapes can browse colors!
